price: Or that He may seize them while they are going about[27], and they will have no escape?
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
footnotes: [27] i.e., their recurrent travels through lands and going about their lives.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
